"Bergmann": "I've been taking good care of that data you gave me."
"Ah, good timing. Do you have a minute?"
"I've got another request I'm hoping you can spot me with."
"So, remember that mountain data you got me before?"
"I've been taking a peek at it every chance I get, and it's sent a wave of old memories crashing over me."
"What I'm saying is, I'd really like to get a gull's-eye view of the sea."
"Sure, I did plenty of fighting there, but there were other things too. Swimming with my friends, building a Central City sandcastle..."
"I'm still stranded here, so could you send me data from this location?"
"Just sail on by while you're doing something else. I'm sunk without you."

"Oh, I see...
Well, if you ever find yourself looking for a trail to tackle, let me know."
